name: Notion Finance Tracker
description: Welcome to our Notion Finance Tracker (FREE)!Finance Tracker provides you with a tool to organize, monitor, and optimize your financial condition. If you are looking for a simple tool to control your finances, but at the same time you want to have visual statistics on the turnover of funds, then this is what you need.What's included? Bank accounts - information about your account balance is displayed here. Income - add your income by month to make it easier to track your total income at the end
features: Bank accounts- information about your account balance is displayed here.; Income- add your income by month to make it easier to track your total income at the end of the month or year.; Expenses- specify all your expenses, whether it's rent or daily grocery purchases.; Categories- create as many expense categories as you need. At the end of the month, you will find out which category of goods you spend more of your money on.; Monthly Summary- check how much money you have received and how much you have spent. Compare them with other months.; Annual Summary- check how much money you have earned and how much money you have spent during the year.
